title: The Duchess of high-low dressing: the style secret behind Kate's Pakistan tour success
text:
There’s a scene in Sex and the City in which Samantha, a publicist, is advising her designer label-averse actor boyfriend Smith on what to wear for a television appearance. “I do insist you top off that tag with some Dior sunglasses,” she tells him. “It’s MTV. If you’re not wearing something the kids can’t afford, how will they know to look up to you?”

That high-low fashion formula paid off for Smith, who went on to become a major star, and it’s a strategy that works in real (royal) life too, as demonstrated by the Duchess of Cambridge on this week’s royal tour in Pakistan.

Of course in this instance, over a decade on since that episode aired, our expectations of people in the public eye have...
description: There’s a scene in Sex and the City in which Samantha, a publicist, is advising her designer label-averse actor boyfriend Smith on what to wear for a television appearance.
